org.apache.ignite.internal.util.gridify

Class GridifyUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.util.gridify.GridifyUtils

  • public final class GridifyUtils
extends Object
    Utility class with common methods used in gridify annotations.

      • UNKNOWN_SIZE

        public static final int UNKNOWN_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getLength

        public static int getLength(Object obj)
        Gets length of elements in container object with unknown type. There is no ability to get size of elements for some object types and method returns UNKNOWN_SIZE value.
        Parameters:
        obj - Container object with elements.
        Returns:
        Elements size of UNKNOWN_SIZE.

      • getIterator

        public static Iterator<?> getIterator(Object obj)
        Gets iterator or create new for container object with elements with unknown type.
        Parameters:
        obj - Container object with elements.
        Returns:
        Iterator.

      • isMethodReturnTypeValid

        public static boolean isMethodReturnTypeValid(Class<?> cls)
        Check if method return type can be used for GridifySetToSet or GridifySetToValue annotations.
        Parameters:
        cls - Method return type class to check.
        Returns:
        true if method return type is valid.

      • isMethodParameterTypeAllowed

        public static boolean isMethodParameterTypeAllowed(Class<?> cls)
        Check if method parameter type type can be used for GridifySetToSet or GridifySetToValue annotations.
        Parameters:
        cls - Method parameter to check.
        Returns:
        true if method parameter type is valid.

      • isMethodParameterTypeAnnotated

        public static boolean isMethodParameterTypeAnnotated(Annotation[] anns)
        Check is method parameter annotated with GridifyInput.
        Parameters:
        anns - Annotations for method parameters.
        Returns:
        true if annotation found.

      • getAllowedMethodReturnTypes

        public static List<String> getAllowedMethodReturnTypes()
        Allowed method return types.
        Returns:
        List of class names or text comments.

      • getAllowedMethodParameterTypes

        public static Collection<String> getAllowedMethodParameterTypes()
        Allowed method return types.
        Returns:
        List of class names or text comments.

      • parameterToCollection

        @Nullable
public static Collection parameterToCollection(Object arg)
        Converts parameter object to Collection.
        Parameters:
        arg - Method parameter object.
        Returns:
        Collection of parameters or null for unknown object.

      • collectionToParameter

        @Nullable
public static Object collectionToParameter(Class<?> paramCls,
                                                     Collection data)
        Converts Collection back to object applied for method.
        Parameters:
        paramCls - Method parameter type.
        data - Collection of data elements.
        Returns:
        Object applied for method.
